extensionDescription.message: Gets a previous version from a webpage using archive.org or archive.is.

search_engine_descr.message: Search engine used by the key g

ctrl_c_descr.message: CTRL+C copies the URL if no text is selected

ctrl_c_require_focus.message: CTRL+C requires focus on page element

prefer_long_link.message: Prefer long link over the short link on archive.is

default_archive_service_descr.message: Default archive service used by the toolbar button

show_contextmenu_item_googlecache.message: Show context menu item Google Cache

automatic_forward.message: Pick the best link automatically (automatic forward)

related_tabs.message: Open new tabs after the current tab

related_tabs_descr.message: Open new tabs next to the current tab as related tabs
